We're Hiring!

Build the Future with
Devs & Logic

Join a team of passionate builders creating world-class SaaS products and MVPs. We believe in innovation, collaboration, and code that matters.

Why Join Us?

We believe that happy employees do their best work. That's why we offer a supportive environment and great benefits.

Flexible Hours

Work when you're most productive with our flexible schedule policy.

Remote Options

Work from home, our office, or anywhere else you feel comfortable.

Health & Wellness

Comprehensive health coverage and wellness programs for you and your family.

Team Events

Regular team lunches, retreats, and social gatherings to build connections.

Growth Budget

Annual stipend for courses, conferences, and books to keep you learning.

Top Equipment

Latest MacBook Pro and high-end peripherals to help you do your best work.

A Culture of Collaboration

We succeed together. Our diverse team brings unique perspectives to solve complex problems.

Current Openings

Ready to make an impact? Check out our available roles below.

Senior React Developer

Full-time
New York, NY (Hybrid)
$120k - $160k

We're looking for a Senior React Developer to join our team and help build cutting-edge SaaS applications. You'll work with modern technologies and contribute to exciting projects for our clients.

Key Requirements

5+ years of experience with React and front-end development
Strong TypeScript skills
Experience with modern React patterns and state management
Knowledge of UI/UX design principles

Backend Developer

Full-time
Remote
$110k - $150k

Join our backend team to develop robust APIs and database solutions for our SaaS and MVP products. You'll be responsible for building scalable backend services that power our applications.

Key Requirements

3+ years of experience with Node.js or similar backend technologies
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
Knowledge of RESTful API design
Understanding of cloud services (AWS/Azure/GCP)

UI/UX Designer

Full-time
New York, NY (On-site)
$90k - $130k

We're seeking a talented UI/UX Designer to create beautiful interfaces for our SaaS applications. You'll work closely with developers and stakeholders to design user experiences that are both attractive and functional.

Key Requirements

3+ years of UI/UX design experience
Proficiency in design tools like Figma/Sketch
Strong portfolio showcasing web and mobile designs
Understanding of user research and testing methodologies

Don't See Your Role?

We're always looking for talent. Send us your resume and we'll keep you on file.
